mapper.select: SELECT good.id, good.good_name, good.description, good.promotion, good.price, good.sale_volume, good.discount, good.stock, good.on_sale, good.hot, good.seo, good.audit, good.is_new, good.create_date, good.last_update_date, good.freight, good.brand_id, good.seller_id, good.visit_total, good.good_no, good.status, good.rich_content, good.main_image_url, tacg.activity_id as activityId, categorygood.category_id as category_id FROM t_good good LEFT JOIN t_activity_good tacg ON tacg.good_id=good.id LEFT JOIN t_category_good categorygood ON categorygood.good_id=good.id WHERE good.id=#{goodId} GROUP BY good.id

SELECT good.id, good.seo, good.good_no, good.good_name, good.description, good.promotion, good.price, good.sale_volume, good.discount, good.stock, good.on_sale, good.hot, good.audit, good.is_new, good.freight, good.brand_id, good.seller_id, good.visit_total, good.main_image_url, good.rich_content, good.create_date, tacg.activity_id, tac.start_date as startDate, tac.end_date as endDate, tac.status as activityStatus, categorygood.category_id as category_id, tacg.stock as activityStock FROM t_good good LEFT JOIN t_activity_good tacg ON tacg.good_id=good.id LEFT JOIN t_activity tac ON tac.id=tacg.activity_id LEFT JOIN t_category_good categorygood ON categorygood.good_id=good.id WHERE 1=1 AND good.seller_id=#{sellerId} AND CONCAT_WS('',good.good_name,good.good_no) LIKE #{searchKey}
AND good.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND good.create_date BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND #{endDate} AND good.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND now() AND good.good_no= #{goodNo} AND good.on_sale= #{saleStatus} AND good.hot= #{hot} AND good.is_new= #{isNew} AND good.freight= #{freight} AND good.brand_id= #{brandId} AND tacg.activity_id= #{activityId} AND tacg.status!='NORMAL' AND categorygood.category_id= #{categoryId} GROUP BY good.id

SELECT good.id, good.seo, good.good_no, good.good_name, good.description, good.promotion, good.price, good.sale_volume, good.discount, good.stock, good.on_sale, good.hot, good.audit, good.is_new, good.freight, good.brand_id, good.seller_id, good.visit_total, good.main_image_url, good.create_date, categorygood.category_id as category_id, tacg.activity_id as activityId, tacg.stock as activityStock, tac.start_date as startDate, tac.end_date as endDate, tac.status as activityStatus FROM t_good good
LEFT JOIN t_category_good categorygood ON categorygood.good_id=good.id LEFT JOIN t_activity_good tacg ON tacg.good_id=good.id LEFT JOIN t_activity tac ON (tac.id=tacg.activity_id AND (tac.status IS NULL OR tac.status!='NORMAL' OR tac.end_date BETWEEN '0' AND NOW()) OR tacg.status='UN_NORMAL')
WHERE good.on_sale='ON_SALE' AND good.seller_id=#{sellerId} AND good.id NOT IN( SELECT tg.id FROM t_good tg LEFT JOIN t_activity_good tag ON tag.good_id=tg.id LEFT JOIN t_activity ta ON ta.id=tag.activity_id WHERE 1=1 AND ( ta.status='NORMAL' OR ( ta.status!='UN_NORMAL' AND ta.start_date IS NOT NULL AND ( ((ta.start_date BETWEEN '0' AND NOW()) AND ta.end_date > NOW()) OR ta.start_date >NOW() ) ) ) AND tag.status='NORMAL' GROUP BY tg.id ) AND CONCAT_WS('',good.good_name,good.good_no) LIKE #{searchKey} AND good.good_no= #{goodNo} AND categorygood.category_id= #{categoryId} AND good.brand_id= #{brandId} GROUP BY good.id

SELECT good.id, good.seo, good.good_no, good.good_name, good.description, good.promotion, good.price, good.sale_volume, good.discount, good.stock, good.on_sale, good.hot, good.audit, good.is_new, good.freight, good.brand_id, good.seller_id, good.visit_total, good.main_image_url, good.rich_content, good.create_date, categorygood.category_id as category_id, tacg.activity_id as activityId, tac.start_date as startDate, tac.end_date as endDate, tac.status as activityStatus, tacg.stock as activityStock FROM t_good good LEFT JOIN t_category_good categorygood ON categorygood.good_id=good.id LEFT JOIN t_activity_good tacg ON tacg.good_id=good.id LEFT JOIN t_activity tac ON tac.id=tacg.activity_id WHERE 1=1 AND good.seller_id=#{sellerId} AND tac.id=#{activityId} AND tac.status='NORMAL' AND tacg.status='NORMAL' AND CONCAT_WS('',good.good_name,good.good_no) LIKE #{searchKey}
AND good.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND good.create_date BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND #{endDate} AND good.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND now() AND good.on_sale= #{saleStatus} AND good.hot= #{hot} AND good.is_new= #{isNew} AND good.freight= #{freight} AND good.good_no= #{goodNo} AND categorygood.category_id= #{categoryId} AND good.brand_id= #{brandId} GROUP BY good.id

SELECT good.id, good.seo, good.good_no, good.category_id, good.good_name, good.description, good.promotion, good.price, good.sale_volume, good.discount, good.stock, good.on_sale, good.hot, good.audit, good.is_new, good.freight, good.brand_id, good.seller_id, good.visit_total, good.main_image_url, good.create_date FROM t_good good WHERE 1=1 AND good.seller_id=#{sellerId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT tcg.good_id FROM t_category_good tcg WHERE tcg.good_id =good.id ) AND CONCAT_WS('',good.good_name,good.good_no,seo) LIKE #{searchKey} AND good.good_no= #{goodNo} AND good.brand_id= #{brandId}
